scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && cd functions && rm -rf lib && cd ..
scripts.build:functions: cd functions && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:all: npm run clean && npm run build:functions && npm run build:client
scripts.dev:prepare: npm run prepare:dev && npm run build:all
scripts.predeploy: npm install && cd functions && npm install && cd ..
scripts.deploy:prepare: npm run prepare:prod && npm run build:all
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:prepare && npm run deploy:functions && npm run deploy:hosting
scripts.deploy:hosting: npm run build:client && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.prepare:prod: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const env = fs.readFileSync('.env', 'utf8').replace(/VITE_USE_EMULATOR=true/g, 'VITE_USE_EMULATOR=false'); fs.writeFileSync('.env', env)"
scripts.prepare:dev: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const env = fs.readFileSync('.env', 'utf8').replace(/VITE_USE_EMULATOR=false/g, 'VITE_USE_EMULATOR=true'); fs.writeFileSync('.env', env)"
